doc:
Francis Ford (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_Ford_(actor) 0 Francis Ford (born Francis Feeney, August 14, 1881 – September 5, 1953) was an American film actor, writer and director. He was the mentor and elder brother of film director John Ford. He also appeared in many of the latter's movies, including Young Mr. Lincoln (1939) and The Quiet Man (1952). Francis_Ford ( born Francis_Feeney , August_14_,_1881 – September_5_,_1953 ) was an_American_film_actor , writer_and_director . He was the_mentor and elder_brother of film_director_John_Ford . He also appeared in many of the_latter 's_movies , including Young_Mr._Lincoln ( 1939_) and The_Quiet_Man_(_1952_) .
